findings.title: I3 - Missing zero length handling
findings.description: The following code is missing the code path in case `tokenIds.length == 0`. This does not have to be an issue, but maybe require/revert can be used here.

findings.title: I5 - Hardcoded types
findings.description: Token types are hardcoded integers (0, 1), which is confusing and not self-explainable. Hardcoded values decrease the code readability and also could lead to bugs.
